Text.Page:
The demon lord Karascha threatened the safety of the expedition, and the world.

You entered Karascha's lair and killed him, but his final words suggested that his efforts were only a distraction from a greater evil. You also uncovered a document suggesting that Elleon survived an earlier encounter with Karascha, and is still alive and looking for answers.

Everything has led to this moment, . Karascha cannot be allowed to complete this ritual, no matter the cost. According to the document you recovered, there is a shrine northwest of this camp. Fight your way through any demons you encounter while I marshal our forces.

We must face Karasha in his lairâ€”and end him.
As soon as you struck the final blow, the demons retreated. We can already feel a shift in the energy of the gorge. <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Karascha said some things... "</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Oh? Leander will be here soon, perhaps he should hear this as well. And there he is!
When Sersine, child of Karas, sent for me, I was hoping to see Elleon. Though I am glad you are safe. What news do you have of my brother?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Here's what happened..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Hmm. One would expect Elleon to be present at such a momentous occasion. But it seems my brother is nowhere to be found. Is there anything else you can tell me? <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I did find this scroll..."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

(Leander reads the scroll)

An ancient script, but one known to me. It says, "Elleon escaped our grasp. We've notified agents in Arun to find and silence him once and for all."

It would seem my brother's absence is not a voluntary one, and he may still be in danger. Follow me back to Tower Base, . Adria must know of this.

Okay. So Elleon was captured. At least we know he got away...

Keep this to yourself for now. If Elleon's captors know you're looking for them, you could be in great danger. We'll figure out a cover story that will work for everyone.
